name: Mage Platformer Game

Intro:

Try this new game prototype that combines adventure and platformer genres (it is a one level loop).

Controls:

WASD -> Movement

Bar Space -> Jump

Right-Buton Clicked -> Camera View

Left-Button -> Cast Magic

Esc -> Quit Game
